titleStmt.title: The Resolvtion and most faithfull expression of the gentry and commonalty of the countie of Essex presented to the House of Parliament Jun. 20 1642, wherein is declared their certaine and reall intentions to maintaine the priviledges of the crowne and Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: "Also the true relation of an opposition and distrubance given to the Earle of Stamford at the training of the traine bands at Leicester ... With the order from the House concerning Mr. Hastings as a delinquent and occasioner of the same disturbance ... As also an order to send for the Maior for proclaiming the Kings proclamation."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
